ServerlessDays Goes Virtual!

published: 2020-03-20
by Emrah Şamdan Farrah Campbell Gunnar Grosch Ant Stanley

We're joining the great pivot to virtual with the announcement of ServerlessDays Virtual. A mixed team of ServerlessDays organisers from around the world are coming together to bring ServerlessDays to you!

ServerlessDays Goes Virtual!

published: 2020-03-20
by Emrah Şamdan Farrah Campbell Gunnar Grosch Ant Stanley

We're joining the great pivot to virtual with the announcement of ServerlessDays Virtual. A mixed team of ServerlessDays organisers from around the world are coming together to bring ServerlessDays to you!
